scripts.build: npm run build:views && npm run build:css && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --omit-source-map-url stylesheets/style.scss dist/style.css && postcss dist/style.css --use autoprefixer --no-map -d dist/
scripts.copy:static: cp -r images dist/images && cp -r assets dist && cp CNAME dist/ && cp app-ads.txt dist/
